channel.title: NaZi ZoMbIeS!
channel.description:
Well post your favourite nazi zombie level and whats the highest level you made it to on ALL of the levels!
Nacht Der Untoten:39 Zombie Verruckt:27 Shi No Numa:43 Der Reise:59<---(True Story O.o)
My favourite is Der Reise [img]http://files.xboxic.com/xbox-360/call-of-duty-5-world-at-war/zombies.jpg[/img]

@pl0x15 wrote:

Favorite: Der Riese

Fav Gun: PPSH, Trench, Thompson, Ray, STG44

I have Maps 2 and 3. (Shi No Numa) & (Der Riese)

Levels:
Shi No Numa- umm i think 26
Der Riese- 28
Natch der Untoten- um i think 25

P.S= I play on 360 and gamertag is: dangbanger49 (no spaces) add me up if u got 360 ad ur up for sum der riese/untoten

item.title: NaZi ZoMbIeS!
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

whip of soulz:

Only noobs play legit, iso mods are the way to go.

Haha, I’m pretty sure it is:P, never modded Nazi Zombies yet, even tho i have the plug to connect the HDD to my computer :/, never found a good tutorial how to actually mod it:p

Ontopic: My favorite map is shi no numa

Rounds i got to:

Nacht Der Untoten: 20 (around 20)
Zombie Verruckt:15 (around 15)
Shi No Numa:27
Der Reise:10 (around 10)

:P, Didn’t like the others as much as Shi No Numa lols.

item.title: NaZi ZoMbIeS!
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:28, topic:341020”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=437416.msg3215458#msg3215458 date=1274640178]

Love it, glad they are bring it back in the new game “Black ops”… Vietnam Zombies will be awesome…

Gosh, i’m mad they ended the story line on WaW to NZ… Yes it had a story line.

They said they would have atleast one more map back.

probs Viet Zombies would be awsome, but they have small eye sight so probs -40% accuracy to them ;D

i got to 294 on Der Reise then died cause fag went to get a drink.

Mod nub? ^^
[/quote]
naw was doing the glitch where you throw the monkey bomb inside the ground and all zombies stand on top of it and it dont blow up, and you just spray the fuck out of them.
I didn’t have monkey bombs and even if i did i didnt know how to do it :p[/quote]
o lol xd

Read full topic

item.title: NaZi ZoMbIeS!
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:23, topic:341020”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=437416.msg3214823#msg3214823 date=1274584655]

In German its pronounced “Vunder Vaffle”
In English its pronounced “Wonder Waffle”

PPSH is pretty pro, The Reaper is pretty epic to XD

Upgraded colt ftw
[/quote]
Lol, yeah
Another question, What do you think is better on Nazi Zombies, Browning or MG42?
In my opinion MG is better because it reloads faster and isnt as heavy.
Yet they both have the same amount of ammo.
~EDIT~
If anybody wants to add my GamerTag its X0ForsakenX0
~EDIT~[/quote]You cant compare them, there both good guns you just have to use them at the right time/place.
The MG is fast but low damage where as the browning is slow but alot stronger.

Read full topic
